file.name: openapi_refined.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  description: 'basic schema to show some couper validation cases'
  title: 'Couper example api'
  version: '0.3'
paths:
  /anything:
    get:
      parameters:
      - in: query
        name: show_env
        schema:
          type: string
        required: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          # last part from our example, response validation:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  url:
                    type: string
                    description: 'upstream url'
                required:
                  - url
